body:
Comment 1 by **lucio.dere**: 
For what it's worth, I've chosen to disregard the existence of the shortcuts ++ and --
because they provide no benefit over += 1 and -= 1 (I could be wrong, I seem to have
only a superficial understanding of matters in general).  In the days when ++ and --
could be prefixes and could be used to return a value, they might have been worth
having, but in Go, they seem superfluous.

We're stuck with them, but I think on principle they could be deprecated.

Lucio.
